## R package test for curves fitting to calculate turgor loss point

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(pvldcurve)
Leaf_data <- leaf_drying_data
PV_data <- pressure_volume_data

PV_data <- RelativeWaterDeficit(pressure_volume_data) #new column with RWD

#Turgor loss point f(RWD) = -1/psi
TurgorLossPoint(PV_data)
```
